1.title: Welcome to Artemis
1.content: Artemis is a learning platform where you can solve programming exercises in interactive learning sessions.

2.title: Course overview
2.content: On this page you can see an overview of all courses which you are signed up for.

3.title: Your current courses
3.content: This is a course you are signed up to. Please check out the course details afterwards by clicking on the panel.

4.title: Next due exercise
4.content: See what exercise has to be completed in the next few days.

5.title: Sign up for other courses
5.content: You can click here and see whether you can sign up for other courses additionally.

6.title: Your notifications
6.content: Get notified about new exercises from this notification dropdown.

7.title: Personal settings
7.content: In your account menu you can change your display language and restart the guided tour at any other time.

8.title: Contact the Artemis team
8.content: Feel free to contact us to leave us some feedback, request features or to report bugs in the application.
